title: Skytops
description: I was in the middle of the ocean standing on one of the 3 skyscrapers. With nothing insight but the two others with me, we just off and dive into the water. Then I woke up.

title: Donald Trump
description: It was the best dream ever. Really, it was the best. Believe me, like I said, best dream ever.

title: Highschool
description: Last night, I had a dream that I was back in high school. I was walking through the hallways and saw all my old classmates. I felt a mix of nostalgia and anxiety in the dream.

title: Beach
description: I was on a beach with my family. We were all playing in the water and having a great time. However, suddenly a giant wave appeared and swept us all away. I woke up feeling scared and disoriented.

title: City
description: I had a dream that I was lost in a city that I had never been to before. I was trying to find my way back to my hotel, but I kept getting turned around and couldn't find my way. Eventually, I stumbled upon a friendly local who helped me find my way back.

title: Superman
description: I was flying through the air like a superhero. It was an incredible feeling of freedom and exhilaration. I flew over buildings and through clouds, feeling completely weightless and free.

title: Chasers
description: I had a dream that I was being chased by a group of unknown people. They were trying to catch me, but I was able to outrun them and escape. When I woke up, I felt relieved and grateful to have gotten away in the dream.
